Item.Name: HP Up
Item.Effect: Adds 3 HP to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Protein
Item.Effect: Adds 3 Attack to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Iron
Item.Effect: Adds 3 Defense to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Calcium
Item.Effect: Adds 3 Special Attack to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Zinc
Item.Effect: Adds 3 Special Defense to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Carbos
Item.Effect: Adds 3 Speed to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: PP Up
Item.Effect: Raises the PP of a selected move by 1/5 of the move's base PP, until 3 PP Ups or one PP Max have been used on the Pokémon's move.
Item.Description: A medicine that can slightly raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.

Item.Name: PP Max
Item.Effect: Raises the PP of a selected move to 8/5 of the move's base PP, but can only be used once per move on a given Pokémon.
Item.Description: A medicine that can optimally raise the maximum PP of a single move that has been learned by the target Pokémon.

Item.Name: Rare Candy
Item.Effect: Raises a Pokémon by one level, up to level 100.
Item.Description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will instantly raise the level of a single Pokémon by one.

Item.Name: Health Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 HP to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base HP of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Muscle Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Attack to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Resist Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Defense to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Genius Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Special Attack to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Clever Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Special Defense to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Swift Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Speed to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Pretty Wing
Item.Effect: Adds 1 Point for each stat to the target Pokémon per use.
Item.Description: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases each base stat of a single Pokémon.
